short_summary: The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) has a requirement for specialized corporate support and associated services
description: The Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS) is the Department of National Defence’s (DND’s) enterprise resource planning (ERP) solution for the entire Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).",
full_summary:
[Title]
RCAF DRMIS Aircraft Maintenance & Materiel Management Informatics Professional Services

[Contract Information]

**File Number:** W8485-TBIPS2023-01
**Procurement Category:** SRV (Service Contract)
**Supply Arrangement:** TBIPS (Task-Based Informatics Professional Services)
**Purchase Description:** Professional services to support aircraft maintenance and materiel management informatics

**Background:**
The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) requires specialized corporate support and associated services for the implementation, sustainment, and application of the DRMIS (Defense Resource Management Information System) modules, specifically the plant maintenance (PM) and materiel management (MM) modules, for aircraft maintenance.

**Scope of Work:**
This contract will cover the provision of professional services to support the following:

* DRMIS PM and MM modules
* Implementation, maintenance, and application of these modules
* Development of new business applications and document integration
* Support for all levels of the organization, including executive, management, and end-user personnel

**Deliverables and Milestones:**
The contracted services will be provided in accordance with the TBIPS (Task-Based Informatics Professional Services) supply arrangement. Deliverables and milestones will be defined in the contract document.

**Security Clearance:**
The selected contractor shall possess a valid security clearance and comply with the specifications outlined in the Contract Security Requirements Handbook.

**Procurement Method:**
This procurement will be conducted through a competitive process, with a pre-screened list of qualified vendors.

**Points of Contact:**

* Department of National Defence, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Nadia Picard, Point of Contact: DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**

The following vendors are pre-qualified to participate in the procurement of these services:

<Insert list of pre-qualified suppliers>

**Submission Guidelines:**
Only pre-qualified vendors will be considered. Proposals must be submitted in the required format and within the specified time frame.

**Notice and Publication:**
This notice has been published in the Government Electronic Tendering System (Canada).
